name: Remember Last Read Tweet
tagline: Save the last tweet you read for later.
body:
###Remember Last Read Tweet
=============

Mark your last read tweet and go right back to it when you get back.

###How to use

![how to use](http://i.imgur.com/Jm2BejS.jpg)

Simply click on the **"last"** link to save the tweet as last and the click on **"Go to last"** whenever you return, the extension will scroll you to the saved tweet.

[Install it from the Chrome Web Store here!](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fnfjecnchnojlpniikiibnglpbonimnb)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
